title: fix: test link in html reporter

body:
## PR Checklist

- [x] Addresses an existing open issue: fixes #5102
- [x] That issue was marked as [`status: accepting prs`](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22status%3A+accepting+prs%22)
- [x] Steps in [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) were taken

## Overview

Fix as mentioned in the [related issue comment](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/issues/5102#issuecomment-1966919750).

LGTM, thanks! Just one style nit, but nothing functionally blocking. 🚀 

Will leave open for a bit in case anybody from @mochajs/maintenance-crew wants to take a look.

The committers listed above are authorized under a signed CLA.

  • :white_check_mark: login: JoshuaKGoldberg / name: Josh Goldberg ✨ (473e7d81da84f40fb50762ae97f2efb758b55097)
  • :white_check_mark: login: danny0838 / name: Danny Lin (6e8bcdf6399400eb89be694afa0f26286065ff9c)
Oh, and - please sign the CLA so we can accept this @danny0838.
